import React, { useEffect , useState} from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import './App.css'; import ima1 from './imagenes/cpu.jpg'; import ima2 from './imagenes/ram.jpg'; import { CircularProgressbar } from 'react-circular-progressbar'; import 'react-circular-progressbar/dist/styles.css'; var datax=[]; /*INICIA PARTE GRAFICA EN EL PROGRAMA */ function App() { const [products, setProducts] = useState(datax); const [valor, setColor] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { loadData(); }, []); const loadData =()=>{ axios .get('http://192.168.20.15:8080/')//backend .then((res) => { console.log(res); setProducts(res.data); datax=res.data }) .catch((err) => { console.log("adfasd"); console.log(err); }); } var cpu=0; var ram=0; var procesos=[] try{ procesos=JSON.parse(datax["mensaje"][0]["pro"]) console.log(procesos[0]) }catch(es){ console.log("aun vacio proc") } try{ cpu=JSON.parse(datax["mensaje"][0]["cpu"]) cpu=cpu[0] ram=JSON.parse(datax["mensaje"][0]["ram"]) ram=ram[0] console.log(cpu) console.log(ram) }catch(es){ console.log("aun vacio proc") } return (
